name: Dicey Garden
description:
Little game made for GMTK Jam 2022

Controls:

Arrow Keys and WASD - Move 

R - Restart 

Enter - Skip Level

Hover your mouse near the cube to see the moves

Credits:

TheBogdichHD - Programming, Game Design, Music and Sounds

Motilda - Programming and Art 

tSaturn - Level Design
